headline: Marketing and communications blogs
text: Distinct  a blog pulling together practical resources to suggest strategies for senior management, planning, and communications teams. DJ The Duchess  a blog covering a range of topics by an HE academic. Jenny Rohn  author and 'lab lit' writer Jennifer L. Rohn blogs about science, women and academia. J F Derry  an author and blogger commenting on Darwinism, music, film and poetry. JISC and community engagement  joint information systems committee (JISC) blog about business and community engagement. Just a few little thoughts  PR manager Mithu Lucraft shares her thoughts on the PR industry, social media, marketing and publishing. Knowledge economy  a news aggregation blog which pulls together emerging stories from the fields of economy, politics and education. Let creativity begin  an collection of creative blogs that aim to inspire through videos and imagery. Science of the Invisible  a blog containing news, views and reviews from A J Cann. If you run a communications and marketing blog and would like it to be featured on the higher education blogs network, get in touch via email or Twitter using the hashtag #HEblognetwork. This content is brought to you by Guardian Professional. To get more articles like this direct to your inbox, become a member of the Higher Education Network.
